content: प्रसक्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Attachment, devotion, addiction, devotedness, adherence. {@--2@} Connection, union, association. {@--3@} Applicability, bearing, application; as in अतिप्रसक्ति (which is = अतिव्याप्ति <ab>q. v.</ab>) {@--4@} Energy, perseverance; संतापे दिशतु शिवः शिवां प्रसक्तिं <ls>Ki. 5. 50.</ls> {@--5@} Conclusion, deduction. {@--6@} A topic or subject of discourse. {@--7@} Occurrence of a possibility. {@--8@} Acquisition, gain.
